title: New: THIEF – Friend Lover
body:
London duo **THIEF** [first appeared](http://admin.

crackintheroad.com/music/20987-introducing-thief/) on CitR back in April of last year, with a duo of tracks that put them up their with the a host of other UK artists vying to lead the synth-pop revival. Having pulled down their early demos and taken a few months to work on new material, they’ve returned with a rerecorded version of _Friend Lover_; sleeker, more refined yet still as grounded amongst simply good pop songwriting. Check it out below, and keep your eyes peeled for more new tracks very soon.

Having pulled down their early demos and taken a few months to work on new material, they’ve returned \[…\]
